thread.title: Mac CRM App Developer, Ntractive, Announces September "Back to Business" Promotion for New Users
thread.title_full: Mac CRM App Developer, Ntractive, Announces September "Back to Business" Promotion for New Users

author: Justin Bartak
title: Mac CRM App Developer, Ntractive, Announces September "Back to Business" Promotion for New Users
text:
Ntractive announces its Elements CRM "Back to Business” Promotion: http://www.ntractive.com/mac-crm/en/promo/back-to-business/ , a special limited-time offer that includes everything a new customer needs to get there business up and running with a Mac CRM (Customer Relationship Management) solution. Ntractive is the cloud-based Mac Customer Relationship Management (Mac CRM) Solution for Mac business and enterprise. Ntractive is reinventing the CRM Experience for Mac users all over the world with their Elements CRM Solution for OSX and iOS devices.
The "Back to Business” Promotion is available through Sept 30, 2015 globally to new customers under Ntractive’s annual cloud subscription program only.
New customers who want to purchase either an Elements CRM Annual Professional, Enterprise or Performance cloud subscription can do so at a discount through the month of September.
Elements CRM is dramatically discounted for the Back to Business promotion with savings up to 40% off the regular cloud subscription price: Elements CRM Performance Edition Annual $79.95 (USD) /user/mo , Elements CRM Enterprise Edition Annual $60.95 (USD) /user/mo and Elements CRM Professional Edition Annual $38.95 (USD) /user/mo
Elements CRM enables you to manage your business, automate business processes, make your data more useful and accessible, and improve your team’s efficiency. In the Back to Business Promotion, new users will find what they need to get started and be successful using Elements CRM, at an affordable price.
To purchase visit the Ntractive Store: https://store.ntractive.com or call Ntractive at 1 (701) 732-0056.
Availability & Pricing
Elements CRM "Back to Business" pricing is available immediately. The download is free but requires a subscription to Elements CRM. Professional Edition annual pricing starts at $38.95/user/mo, Enterprise Edition annual pricing starts at $60.95/user/mo. and Performance Edition annual pricing starts at $79.95. http://www.ntractive.com/mac-crm/en/pricing/ Some features are not available in all of the editions. Elements CRM 6.0 is available on the Ntractive Website and the Apple App Store.
About Ntractive
Ntractive is the Mac Customer Relationship Management (Mac CRM) company that develops Elements CRM. Ntractive is changing the way companies collaborate, work and communicate on the Mac and iOS Devices. The company's Elements Platform, which is part desktop and part cloud, is powered by Webkit. Webkit is the open source browser engine that is used by Safari, the iPad and iPhone and many other applications. To learn more about Ntractive, go to http://www.ntractive.com
©2006-2015 Ntractive, the Ntractive logo, Elements CRM, and the Elements CRM logo are trademarks of Ntractive, LLC. Other company and product names may be trademarks of their respective owners.
